text: Tomaloke e'ito dharana karaicha neki ye, tomalokaka ene'i erai diya haâ€™ba? Athaca allahe etiya'o prakasa karaa na'i ye, tomalokara majata kone jihada karaiche arau kone allaha arau te'omra raachula lagate muminasakalara bahirae ana kako antaranga bandhu hicape grahana karaa na'i; arau tomaloke yi karaa se'i bisaye allaha samyaka aragata
